results.title: Goats Gruff: Majesty and the monstroid
results.brief_description:
When the crown prince of their magical kingdom is taken hostage, 3 superheroes (who also happen to be goats) take on the evil mastermind behind the kidnapping.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)

results.title: Exquisite video
results.creator_credit: Brendan McKnight and RMIT Media Arts
results.brief_description:

Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)

results.brief_description:
Thoughtful animated work on modern city life and the desire to escape from the claustrophobic world of the ever encroaching brick walls that confine, alienate and isolate us.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)

results.title: RMIT Media Arts Collection 2004
results.brief_description: A collection of student works created as part of coursework at Media Arts, RMIT including three untitled works, two of which are uncredited. The third untitled work was made by Michelle Mills.
